tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Heartfelt thanks to Dr shilpa Shri n For handling my Pregnancy with utmost care and guiding me at every step with compassion. She is very approachable and explains all the reports in detail. Never does unnecessary Test. 

The most important part is she encourages a lot for normal delivery and guides  us on exercises, which helps us To achieve normal delivery.

Today we had blessed with baby girl, it‚Äôs only because of you, madam. I recommend her for all gynaecological consultation and pregnancy care

We consulted her in Cloud 9 Kanakapura Road and had the best experience from Hospital staff

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My experience with Shilpa shree mam has been very positive and satisfying. Talking to Shilpa shree mam will be like u are communicating to a sister next door.. her charm and energy is infectious.. 
coming to the treatment that she provides we are married for 7 years with repeated losses and low AMH with no hopes and as a last doctor that I am going to visit I consulted mam. With in 2 months of consultations I got conceived naturally where in I have tried IVF in the past which has been a failure. 
With minimal medication mam treats you since mine was a high risk she provided lot of care to my case (she would do the same to any one I believe).
Cut shot to present day I am a mother to 10 days old beautiful daughter all this wouldn‚Äôt have happened
Without mam‚Äôs support and her treatment.
Writing a long post so that this helps to someone  through this community. I highly recommend her to anyone blindly. 
Thankful to everything mam has done to me. She is god sent angel in my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi i am Anjali consulting Dr Shilpashree  N for pregnancy care. I have come across dr through a group in Facebook where she is very famous and has helped many patients. 

I had pcos and was consulting her in clinic. Now I am conceived and getting treated for pregnancy care.

Today we are blessed with baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi I am Ashwini . I have consulted Dr Shilpashree N madam in clinic . For the first time I consulted Dr in clinic she was very approachable, and friendly. I had too many complications in life. First I suffered conceiving issues, Dr guided me medications and lifestyle changes. I conceived.
Than I had short cervix , underwent cervical stitch for the same. Few weeks later developed diabetes, managed with insulin and diet. 

At last I completed 37 weeks and delivered a healthy baby.  All thanks to ma'am. 

I highly recommend Dr Shilpashree N to all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: hi I am mili, consulting Dr Shilpashree N in hospital kanakpura hospital,  I had many complications in pregnancy like PCOs and gestational diabetes. I had consulted many doctors and had a very bad experience with them.  In fact I was going into depression. I came across cloudnine hospital and heard very good reviews about Dr. we met her and on the very first visit she was so welcoming.   She went through our case file, understood our cse  and she promised she would give her the best treatment.  My wife was so relieved and the dr took good care. In fact one week prior she admitted when my baby scan reports showed so many complications like lss liquor , Doppler changes.  She gave the best care, . Today we  delivered a baby girl. all thanks t Dr Shilpashree Nu r the bestwe highly recommend u mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: hi I am Iniya consulting DrShilpashree N consulted her for irregular cycles with pcos. Dr was very friendly,explained me my issue in detail, did all the tests related to it. I am blessed with baby girl.ma'am guided me exercises related to normal delivery, motivated me a lot ,helped me to deliver normally. review:
This is Niharika here. I have been consulting Dr Shilpashree N for my pregnancy care.

I had 2 previous miscarriage and lost hope of having baby. But my relative referred me to this doctor. 

Initially doc suggested few tests to find out the cause. Later I came to know that I had uterus related problems. She did laparoscopic surgery  and now I am in my 4th month pregnancy.

I feel I got new life because of Dr.Shilpashree.
She is like a God to me.

I stay 39 km far from her clinic. But I feel it's worth the travel. The best part is doctor gives online video consultation. *** ** *** **** ****** **** * **** **** *******

Thank you so much.

Loads of love to u.

review: I visited Dr Shilpashree last month due to Ectopic pregnancy surgery. She handled my situation very well and she is one of the friendly doc i have come across who wil remove our fear and her kind words make us feel comfortable.. I recovered well and early with her good guidance. Thank u doc.. Would recommend her to everyone who wants to get * **** treatment for any medical issue it may be..
